tabs.default:
E-Class is the first class within [[UHA]], housing the most elite student within the school.

*see also*: [[tboah characters]]

[[toc]]

# Entry
To be legible to enter A-Class, a student must be within the top 18 of the entrance examination ranking and must maintain a top grade.

# Location
The Class is located at the first floor of the main UHA Campus


# Teachers
The current teachers of A-Class are the following
* [[Union Prime]]
